questions_and_notes: Why isn't this variable named "rv" for consistency with rv-tavg-p0850-hxy-air and rv-tpt-p0700-hxy-air?   To simplify and make more consitent with those 2 variables, can we define it "at 700 hPa" rather than over the 850-600hPa layer?
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 2 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
